TextEng: Enough with the pleasantries. I have questions.
Fine, except for the fighting... which you didn't join in.
Text: 싸움만 빼면 괜찮아... 근데 넌 안 도왔잖아.

TextEng: I should be going
I need some healing.
I'd like to see what you have in stock.
<StartAction>[Show her the crystal.]</Start> Have you ever seen anything like this?
Text: <StartAction>[수정을 보여준다.]</Start> 이런 거 본 적 있어?

TextEng: Tell me what you know about this desert.
Text: 이 사막에 대해 아는 거 말해줘.

TextEng: I don't need to know any of this.
What does that have to do with this desert?
Why did the Empire fall?
There are no traces of it?
Tell me about the Netheril Empire.
That's all I need to hear.
Flying cities? Do they still exist?
I could use some advice on my future.
Text: 내 미래에 대한 조언을 듣고 싶어.

TextEng: Tower? What tower?
Are you saying that *I* will fall due to pride?
This is of no help at all.
Bah! I don't believe any of this!
Text: 뭐! 이런 거 하나도 안 믿어!

TextEng: Thank you very much.
Can you give me another reading?
I don't know. What can you do for me?
Text: 모르겠어. 날 위해 뭘 해줄 수 있는데?

TextEng: It's been tolerable, so far.
It doesn't seem so great to me.
